Package de.bangle_bridge.bangle_bridge

Class SerialSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback
      • de.bangle_bridge.bangle_bridge.BtSocket
  • class SerialSocket
extends android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCallback
    wrap BLE communication into socket like class - connect, disconnect and write as methods, - read + status is returned by SerialListener

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      private class  SerialSocket.Cc245XDelegate

      delegate device specific behaviour to inner class
      private class  SerialSocket.NrfDelegate  
      private class  SerialSocket.Rn4870Delegate  
      private class  SerialSocket.TelitDelegate
